about_the_game:
※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable.

Protect yourself from the hot summer sun with the Rash Guard Swimwear and accessories. This set includes the summer exclusive 'Pew Pew Water Gun' emote!

Available until the 2019-10-02 Maintenance.

Included Items:
- Rash Guard Swimwear
- Aqua Shoes
- Gradient Sunglasses
- Water Proof Watch (L)
- Space Water Gun
- Pew Pew Water Gun

name: KurtzPel - Rash Guard Costume Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 6100 3.7 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 ti or AMD Radeon™ R7 360 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Low" (720p/60fps when "High")
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 6500 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/40fps when graphics settings are set to "High"

short_description: ※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable. Protect yourself from the hot summer sun with the Rash Guard Swimwear and accessories. This set includes the summer exclusive 'Pew Pew Water Gun' emote! Available until the 2019-10-02 Maintenance.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Thai, Polish, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
